scopecontent.p: 2 posters, one in English, one in multiple languages
Poster: Immigrant Workers Freedom Ride, Rally & Festival, NYC, 2003; Health in Aging Month, 2000 (3 pcs.); Meet Janie-one of America's best dressed women to be; Study Period

did.unittitle: Poster: We Are All Workers: Remember the Triangle Fire-March 25, 2014--12-1 PM (2 copies)
